channel.title: 'Javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command. [HELP]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b17/martinnguyen/untitled-4.jpg[/img] first compiler is SvenScap3PK and the second is Project16 V.6
As you can see i downloaded jdk.1.6.0_01 or JDK 6u1 (http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp)
Every time i click compile this error always show up.
I already forward my port and created my no-ip. this is the only thing stopping me! HELP!!

item.title: 'Javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command. [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @LoveScaper LoveScaper
item.description:
@LoveScaper wrote:

Easy Fix
step 1:Right Click And Choose Edit on “compile.bat”
step 2:Replace All Text With This Code…

@Echo Off "C:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp *.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: 'Javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command. [HELP]

item.title: 'Javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command. [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

iMONSTAR:

k. ill download online one instead of offline. i think the mod tharok guide said offline

Evl:

Hmm, are you sure that you downloaded the right version, because on the download page there are like 3 different one’s that have somewhat the same thing and if you don’t have the right one it might not work… If you are sure you have the right one, try redownling or download a different one and it might work…

^^he doesnt know what hes talking about, to fix that error you have to download the latest java, like it says in the compiler frmo mod tharok you dont have a updated java…
